# Paramétrage

Je charge mes librairies

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
```

Je charge mes données @goodman2018

```{r}
AP_Vahatra <- st_read("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BETSAKA/Tools/main/data/AP_Vahatra.geojson")
```

# Visualisation

```{r}
tmap_mode("view")

tm_shape(AP_Vahatra) + 
  tm_polygons() + 
  tmap_options(check.and.fix = TRUE)
```
